SIMS Help

     

Taking the register

A few clicks and you’re done.

Opening Take Register

  1. Open the Menu.
  2. Use the Menu Search to find the Class Log.
  3. Choose your class.
  4. Click Take Register on the toolbar.
  5. point

For teachers, there’s a shortcut to Take Register in the Quick Links.

Take Register only allows you to record registration for the current day. Use Edit Marks to change marks in the past or the future.

If a pupil arrives late for registration, change the Absent mark to Late by clicking the L button on the pupil, then set the number of minutes late.

We calculate the pupil’s lateness from the start of the session, but you can set the time by clicking the Minutes Late button.

Add, update or delete comments about a pupil’s attendance by clicking the Add Note button.

If there’s a comment recorded for a pupil, the Add Note button highlights.

The note should relate to the pupil’s attendance or absence for the session. Use the Pupil Log to record all other notes.

We’ve made it easy to enter Present, Absent or Late marks. But if you need to record other marks, click the Additional Marks button.

To enter the same mark for multiple pupils:

  1. Select one or more pupils by clicking their image.
  2. Click Flood Fill Marks on the toolbar.
